lead_paragraph: BOWMAN--Ralph "David", 81, on May 5th. Andover '53 and Yale '57. David was a Major in the Marine Corps, worked in advertising, and as an Actor. Coming to grips with addiction and his recovery led to a lifelong focus of helping others. Full of wit and knowledge, a quintessential New Yorker, He lived and loved with great heart and joy. An ardent St. Louis Cardinal's fan, his dedication went beyond all reason. He's survived by his loving wife, Gail, his children and stepson, Bruss, Cindy and Daniel, grandchildren and a devoted family of nephews and nieces. A memorial service will be held at 11am, June 11th at St. Paul's Church in Darien, CT. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Pivot Ministries or the Smile Train. 1/3
